name: ICONIKA
description:
An abstract visual novel puzzle game about perspective and death. You find yourself in search of three murderers in this plane of existence, exploring concepts of existential horror and philosophy. Progression is left up to the player to discover as well as the underlying concepts of the world.

Features:
-Perspective shifting using "Spectrum Vision".
-Multiple option Dialogue.
-First person exploration mechanics.
-Non-Linear Storytelling.

*WARNING*
DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME IF YOU HAVE A HISTORY OF EPILEPSY AND/OR SEIZURES

Soundtrack Available September 9th 2015.

A Michael T Moreno Game.
